___intfName.description: Name of the network interface inside the chute

___vlan_id.description: VLAN tag for traffic to and from the chute

___ipv4_network.description: Request specific IP network in slash notation

___relay.description: Address of a DHCP server if this server will be acting as a relay agent (experimental)

___limit.description: Size of address range beginning at start value.

___dns.description: List of DNS servers to advertise to connected clients
